channel.title: Caravaggio on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Caravaggio on Let's see what happens.

item.title: The Cardsharps
item.description: I have experienced the sudden escalation effect of the picture. I wonder if background information and other pictures influenced that experience too or the picture is self-contained. I assume this picture for me has opened the door for other works of the author. I wonder if it casts a shadow too. Spoilers the artist was involved in stabbing a person to death over gambling matters English naming of picture sounds sharp other paintings too often have or imply sharp objects
